title: Delabity
description: My server PC running AlmaLinux with several VMs and Docker containers.
details:
System specifications:

  • AMD Ryzen 5 5600X (6-core/12-thread)
  • ASUS TUF B650X Motherboard
  • 32GB DDR4-3200 RAM
  • 3TB HDD (hosting Chronos VM)
  • 128GB SSD (for VM)
  • AlmaLinux with virtualization support

This build serves as my home server running multiple virtual machines and Docker containers for various services and development environments.
